Package com.example.decisiondice

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoryPicker
    Class which allows users to pick a category in which they want the Decision Dice to make a decision (dinner, drinks, music).
    CoffeeActivity
    Class for activity to confirm a decision of 'coffee'.
    CoffeeConfirmActivity
    Subclass to order coffee via OOCSI.
    DinnerOptions
    Subclass for dinner category.
    DrinksOptions
    Subclass for drinks category.
    MainActivity
    Main class using the layout shown to the user when starting the application.
    MusicOptions
    Subclass for music category.
    OOCSIHandler
    This class contains the OOCSI listener setup and the OOCSI handler method.
    OOCSISender
    Singleton class to hold our OOCSI client.
    Options
    Superclass for activities where the user can select their options.
    PizzaActivity
    Class for activity to confirm a decision of 'pizza'.
    PizzaConfirmActivity
    Subclass to order pizza via OOCSI.
    RollDice
    Class for rolling the dice.
    StatusHandler
    This class serves to handle received Twitter statuses (statuses containing our group's Twitter handle).
    Tweeter
    This class is the main class for the Tweetbot module.
    TwitterIDHolder
    Singleton class for holding the user's Twitter ID.
